author: Special Correspondent
text:
Epilepsy centre at Fortis Malar Hospital

Fortis Malar Hospital has launched the Fortis Comprehensive Epilepsy Centre.

The centre aims at combating epilepsy and consistently delivering results comparable to the best available in the world, according to a press release.

The centre is aided by an evaluation set up, a team of doctors and number of caregivers.

Over 100 successful epilepsy surgeries have been performed in recent years by the team of doctors, the press release added.

As part of observing the World Epilepsy Day, the hospital is organising an epilepsy check campaign from February 8 to 29.

The hospital is thus encouraging the general public with pre-existing problems to get subsidised evaluations and consultations with the hospitals’ specialists. – Special Correspondent
title: Comprehensive epilepsy centre opened
